title: AudacityLoL - looking for a Mid/Jungle player ranked gold/High silver.
body:
AudacityLoL - looking for a Jungle or mid  player ranked gold/High silver.

Must be able to commit to roughly 3 nights of gaming as well as play in Saturday iron to gold/plat tournaments
This is what the block will roughly look like each week,
2 Nights Of Scrims
1 Night Of Flex
1 Tournament Day
Sunday Vod Review
Asked Availability at the start of the week
 
Players must also have a working mic and discord.

We are looking for a person who is willing to learn and grow with the team, 
Thankyou look forward to hearing from you soon. add xheroborn for more details

replies.body:
YouveBeenSwain 

Im a zac OTP

Jungler
